# Git

### *Version control systems are typically used to track and manage changes to source code files*

### *Git was built to help design software, with lots of collaborators working on multiple files at the same time*



---
background-image: url(img/GitHub-Mark-120px-plus.png)
background-position: 90% 10%
background-size: 10%
class: left, top

# Git***...the bad news first!***

--

### Git is frustrating to learn

--

#### The command line is cryptic and leaves little room for error

--

### Version control is something *we do*, not just something *we use*

--

#### Git control forces us to formalize processes and takes planning

--

### Git is complicated because change is complicated

--

> *"Git isn't difficult because you're not smart enough, or because you missed an important meeting. Git is difficult because Git is difficult."* - David Demaree, Git For Humans
